Text: I get "AppId is not configured" does anyone know how to solve it?
same here. "AppID is not configured". Game won't start.

Anyone can confirm that it works for him? I saw comments mentioning some appid but should i suppose it's smth the rest have figured out or never had a problem to start with? because there are plenty of seeders,an answer would be nice.
I downloaded this & when i run setup.exe i get an error "ShellExecuteEx failed; code 1155" . If anyone has got a clue on how to fix this please share or otherwise downloaders be aware.
ehm...Kinda ashamed i didn't think of this earlier but... Just run setup.exe as Administrator and it'll work fine. Apologies to the uploader for the "be aware" comment above

@ lili9000c:
When u will open the skidrow folder in the mounted folder then u will get 3 files named;
1.SKIDROW
2.steam_api.dll
3.Steamclient.dll

copy all these 3 items in ur main installed folder
it will works for sure.
Try running the setup as administrator, it worked for me.
